TopicTitle: Airlock/ladder collider broke all command modules in game?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

So I'm close to finishing a barebones mod and the last step is getting the airlock & ladder working.

I have followed every turorial i can find to the letter. Yet it still won't work. 

On the last write I was sure it would work. But it actually caused all command modules in the game to cease working. (They no longer registered as able to have crew inside) strangely, even after I removed my mod, the problem still persisted?

Any idea what could have caused that?
Afaik it's a bug in one the latest prerelease version of 1.1. Try updating.
